import React from "react"; export default function ContactUs (){ return (

You can reach us via

Our Social Media Platforms

Facebook

Dial A Mechanic FB

Twitter

Dial A Mechanic Tweet

Instagram

Dial A Mechanic Insta
Our official email address

Facebook

Send Email
Our toll-free mobile

Telephone number

222-333-4444
) }
